- 1024x768 - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 You are very welcome! I look forward to speaking with you. Nicolette ___________________________________Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: ntaylor@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <bbentley@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Mark Shackelford [mailto:mark.shackelford77@gmail.com] Sent: Friday, December 30, 2011 12:30 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: MBO Information and Net Cash Estimates Thanks, Nicolette. I'll be in touch. MarkMark Shackelford Sent from my iPhone On Dec 30, 2011, at 11:22, Nicolette Taylor <ntaylor@mbopartners.com> wrote:Hi Mark, I had a nice holiday with my family I hope you did the same! I am excited to hear you are moving forward with MBO, and I will send you the link to enroll in the system shortly. You will follow the link, complete the online paperwork and at the end there will be an enrollment packet for you to print off, and in that packet is an I-9 form that you need to take to a local notary to have them sign as an authorized representative (there is also an example page of what they fill out and what you sign). I will need you to email or fax the signed document to me and your piece of the enrollment will then be complete. I would be happy to have a follow up conversation with you and will attach the link to my calendar below for you to schedule a convenient time. https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK I look forward to speaking with you and have a Happy New Year! Nicolette ___________________________________Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: ntaylor@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Mark Shackelford [mailto:mark.shackelford77@gmail.com] Sent: Thursday, December 29, 2011 3:35 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: MBO Information and Net Cash Estimates Hi, Nicolette, hope you're having a pleasant holiday as well as some high quality time off. I have a few consulting opportunities that may gel in January. I'd like to enroll with MBO so we can hit the ground running when the time comes. I'd like to connect with you next week if possible. Please refresh me on getting into your appointment scheduling system. Thanks, and Happy New Year! Mark
Mark Shackelford On Dec 13, 2011, at 10:52, Nicolette Taylor <ntaylor@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlBLvgll4%2F2aKazhmTrSfs%2F%2Fm7twCP7qnMwx1CIUGIalUg%3D%3D>> wrote: Hi Mark, It was a pleasure speaking with you today!
